name: Solid Gold
content: Smoke you out properly
Roll with me you see lots of w**d
Like the doctor we got degrees
Smokin' kush overseas
Satisfy her wants and her needs
She wit' me on her knees
Got a car with no keys take
A joint and fill it with trees
Got a lot of girls on my team
I pull up make 'em scream
Kushy all on my jеans roll
The w**d she suck me to sleep
Spеnd a couple of weekends
Will you do the shrooms
She said all depends if
We like exclusive smoke
And exclusive girls
Straight shots and pounds to blow
Real bosses so we all grow
Live large but every trip we take
The money always on the mind
From the doubt remember one thing
We always gotta stay solid
Drink McQueen out the bottle
Take pictures of my b***h she a model
Bad b***h ridin' shotgun
Mint condition '56
In the front '61 with the top gone
Make 'em wonder what's next
Know I gotta come correct rep the set
We like exclusive smoke
And exclusive girls
Straight shots and pounds to blow
Real bosses so we all grow
Live large but every trip we take
The money always on the mind
From the doubt remember one thing
We always gotta stay solid
Wizzle got wings
Wizzle got everything
